meanings.definition: Not aware or conscious of something.
meanings.sent1: She walked through the park, completely unaware of the birds chirping around her.
meanings.sent2: The child was unaware of the surprise party waiting for him at home.
meanings.sent3: He was so unaware of the prank being played on him that he fell for it easily.
meanings.sent4: The cat lounged in the sun, unaware of the drama unfolding next door.
meanings.sent5: The hiker, unaware of the approaching storm, continued on the trail.

meanings.definition: Lacking knowledge or information about something.
meanings.sent1: The student was unaware of the upcoming test and didn't study.
meanings.sent2: She was unaware of the new restaurant in town and missed out on trying their delicious food.
meanings.sent3: He felt unaware of the latest fashion trends, wearing outdated clothes to the party.
meanings.sent4: The detective remained unaware of the crucial clue hidden in plain sight.
meanings.sent5: The explorer, unaware of the hidden treasure nearby, continued his journey without stopping.
